item.description:
This fast-paced action film marks the third outing with Jason Statham playing the role of Frank Martin. For THE TRANSPORTER 3, Olivier Megaton (THE RED SIREN) takes over the directorial reins from Corey Yuen and Louis Leterrier.

Highly recommend if you have the time to rent Transporter 1 and 2 - both great action movies.

There choices are 4:05 PM or 7:35 PM movie time. We will go with the 4:05 PM movie time. Meet at 3:45 PM in the lobby. Then maybe we can have a bite to eat afterwards at Chatters.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet just inside of the front entrance
item.name: Transporter 3
